creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Makiji Hase
description: two images on mount: top image has five lines of calligraphy; lower image has a gnarled and bent pine tree with two mushrooms growing from LL of trunk, and inscription at R
marks:
Signatures, Inscription, and Seals

Image 1: [Te image 1, L: [ 信天翁 ]; image 2, URQ: [ 信天翁画題 ]
medium: Ink and colors on crepe paper
title: Pine and Poem Gifts
